---
name: Report a problem
about: This way we can identify problems and fix them
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: eaoui

---

**Describe the problem**
Write a clear and concise description of what the problem is. If applicable, add screenshots.

**Give additional information**
Giving any of the following information is helpful (_and optional_):
* Browser [e.g. Chrome]
* Browser version [e.g. 44]
* Theme version [e.g 1.1.1]
* WordPress version [e.g. 5.3.1]
* PHP version [e.g. 6.2]
